org.ingatan.component.text
Class EmbeddedImage

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  org.ingatan.component.text.EmbeddedGraphic
                      org.ingatan.component.text.EmbeddedImage
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class EmbeddedImage
extends EmbeddedGraphic
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener

A JPanel which displays an image. This is used as an embedded component for the RichTextArea as it is able to pass back its image reference for serialisation. The image reference allows this component to be reconstructed later.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Thomas Everingham
See Also:
Serialized Form

Field Detail

MAX_IMAGE_WIDTH

public static final int MAX_IMAGE_WIDTH
The maximum recommended width of the image. These two variables are not enforced, but provide the basis for the result of the isImageTooLarge method.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

MAX_IMAGE_HEIGHT

public static final int MAX_IMAGE_HEIGHT
The maximum recommended height of the image. These two variables are not enforced, but provide the basis for the result of the isImageTooLarge method.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

Parameters:
img - the image to paint.

parentLibraryID - the ID of the library that this resource exists within

isImageTooLarge

public boolean isImageTooLarge()
Checks the image dimensions and returns whether either of them breach the values in MAX_IMAGE_WIDTH or MAX_IMAGE_HEIGHT. The user will not be forced to not use an image which is too large, but this method can be used to determine whether or nto they should be warned about large images.

Returns:
true if the image is larger than the recommended maximum size.

getMaxRecommendedSize

public java.awt.Dimension getMaxRecommendedSize()
Get the maximum recommended size for images in Ingatan.

Returns:
the maximum recommended size for images in Ingatan.

resizeTo

public void resizeTo(java.awt.Dimension d,
                     boolean respectAspectRatio)
Resizes both the component and content to the specified dimension.

Parameters:
d - the new size of the image adn component.
respectAspectRatio - if false the image should be resized to the dimension d, if true the image will have its largest side resized to the corresponding dimension in d.
